attributes.action: dismiss allan leighton and adam crozier as chairman and chief executive of Royal Mail
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is imperative that we stop these two men trying to destroy what is a vitally important public service.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "dismiss allan leighton and adam crozier as chairman and chief executive of Royal Mail."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14999.asp

Prime Minister's Office
